column1: Little Goat Diner////A personal favorite in the West Loop. Little Goat never ceases to amaze me with their quirky twists on American diner classics. Kimchi rueban
column2: sloppy GOAT....even their grilled cheese has guanciale on it! Everything I've tried here has been outstanding and fresh. They're great for brunch
column3: lunch and dinner too! Though there might be a wait
column4: trust me it's worth it! They have one of the best rooftop patios in the city
column5: so wait the extra time for the full outdoor experience!
